title: Patent System in Hyundai Mobis
subTitle: Multi-language support for internal patent system
overviewContent: Updated the system to support multiple languages based on the user's location or preferences

jd: Added language preference functionality to allow users to select Korean or English.
Modified JSP, JSTL, and properties files to support multi-language content.
Updated database schemas and created ERDs to accommodate language-specific data.
Performed unit and integration testing to ensure correct system behaviour.
Prepared basic documentation for end users.
